text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Camp finishes without a hitch, and<n>though it's now autumn,
the Twinkle<n>Series is wrapped in what feels like<n>the heat
of midsummer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In the center of that heat are the<n>sisters Narita Brian and
Biwa<n>Hayahide.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian conquers the Kikuka Sho,<n>beating last year's
record set by Biwa<n>Hayahide!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Before you is the fifth ever Triple<n>Crown champion!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The younger sister crushes theJapanese Derby, so the elder breaksthe record for the Takarazuka Kinen.Then the younger sister breaksanother record.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
They may be competing in different<n>races, but the whole
racing world's<n>watching their records as if they're<n>facing
each other.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Everyone believed it wouldn't be<n>long before we saw the
two race<n>head-to-head in the Arima Kinen. That<n>is, until
recently...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Sheesh, reporters are still crawling all<n>over this place. They
don't give up<n>easily, huh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Of course. Given the title's prestige,<n>it's no wonder they all
want an<n>exclusive interview with a Triple<n>Crown
champion.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Who knows when we'll see such a<n>historic event again?
This kind of<n>media attention is a given.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Welp, they must be pretty<n>disappointed that the all-important<n>
Brian's nowhere to be found.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Isn't she visiting Hayahide in the<n>hospital?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I told her she should.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I told her she should.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
She refused when I asked her to go<n>with me. Perhaps she
wasn't<n>prepared at the time.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Well, she's family after all. That'd be<n>a shock for anyone.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That and I believe Brian was rather<n>excited to be racing
Hayahide in the<n>Arima Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That's true. Every time Hayahide<n>achieved something big,
the flame in<n>Brian's eyes would grow even<n>stronger.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her desire to compete against her<n>sister was so strong that
she<n>considered even the Triple Crown a<n>mere stepping
stone. But now...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
To see your biggest rival unable to so<n>much as enter the
race... I'm worried<n>about the two of them.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Brian...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I do wish I could've been the one to<n>topple the mighty Triple
Crown<n>champion.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Glad to see you're well enough to<n>talk smack.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
My injury in the Tenno Sho was<n>worse than I realized. Such
a shame,<n>really... I'd already formulated my<n>winning
equation to defeat you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Only you would think to use equations<n>in a race. Way too
big-brained for a<n>racer.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: M-my head isn't that big!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Brian, my equations aren't empty<n>theories. I was set to win
the Arima<n>Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Do you remember the sports<n>competition you won when we
were<n>young?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: No, not really.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I figured... Ever since then, winning's<n>been natural for you.
It means so little<n>to you that you don't remember<n>placing
first in the competition.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
A genius mathematician is never<n>satisfied with mundane
problems. The<n>only joy they find is in tackling the<n>
unsolvable.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It's the same for you. You're not<n>satisfied with ordinary
races because<n>of your outstanding talent. You have a<n>
hunger that can't be sated.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I can't compete with you through<n>mere effort. So I sought a
solution, and<n>what I found is the method I use now.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
The results I've produced prove that<n>I'm not shooting in the
dark. I've<n>nailed down my formula.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...I would've preferred you prove it to<n>me in the Arima Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'll get to the point. I've had plenty of<n>time lying here, so
I've made an<n>equation for the Arima Kinen,<n>removing
myself from the variables.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But no matter how much I recalculate,<n>the results show that
you'll win.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'm not sure how you feel not getting<n>to race against me
there, but... you've<n>got to win this one, Brian.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Heh.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You didn't need some special<n>equation to tell me that.
Obviously I'm<n>going to win.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
...And even if you were there, you'd<n>have seen that they
were just empty<n>theories once I beat you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
So promise that you'll prove those<n>equations of yours to me
one day.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hehe... Sure. I promise.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'll prove Sis's equation myself... at<n>the Arima Kinen!
